parameters.name: restaurantAdminId
parameters.description: To filter the restaurants that are related to the restaurantAdmin id. Default null to ignore this param and get all.

parameters.name: isPublished
parameters.description: To filter the restaurants that are published or not. Default null to get both.

parameters.name: isCurrentlyOpenToOrder
parameters.description: To filter the restaurants that are currently open to order or not. Default null to get both.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page you want within 1 and 10 000. Default 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size you want within 1 and 30. Default 30.

parameters.name: restaurantId
parameters.description: The id of the restaurant you want to get the products.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page you want within 1 and 10 000. Default 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size you want within 1 and 250. Default 250.

parameters.name: isAvailable
parameters.description: To filter the restaurants that are available or not. Default null to get both. A product is available when isActive is true, quantity is null or > 1, expirationDateTime is null or in the future.

parameters.name: productIds
parameters.description:
To filter the products having the id matching one of this `set` of id.  
Repeat this parameter to filter on multiple id.  
Duplicates will be ignored.

parameters.name: restaurantId
parameters.description: The id of the restaurant you want to get the orders.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The id of the customer you want to get the orders.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page you want within 1 and 10 000. Default 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size you want within 1 and 50. Default 50.

parameters.name: minCreationDateTime
parameters.description: The minimum date of filtered orders creation date time.

parameters.name: maxCreationDateTime
parameters.description: The maximum date of filtered orders creation date time.

parameters.name: orderStates
parameters.description:
To filter the orders having their current state matching one of this `set` of states.  
Repeat this parameter to filter on multiple states.  
Duplicates will be ignored.  
One of:
  - `0`: Idling,
  - `1`: Acknowledged,
  - `2`: InPreparation,
  - `3`: Ready,
  - `4`: Delivered,
  - `5`: Other,
  - `6`: Cancelled,
  - `7`: Rejected

email.description: It should be lowercase email format and could contain '.', '-' and/or '_' characters.
It should be a lowercase Ynov email format and could contain '.', '-' and/or '_' characters.

dayOfWeek.description: The day to apply this opening time. Starting from Sunday: 0 to Saturday: 6, for example 4 is thursday.

OffsetInMinutes.description: Number of minutes past from 00:00 for example 10:00 is 600, which means the restaurant is open since 10:00.

DurationInMinutes.description: Number of minutes the restaurant is open since the offset, for example 120 minutes, which means the restaurant is open during 2h since 10:00.

dayOfWeek.description: The day to apply this opening time. Starting from Sunday: 0 to Saturday: 6, for example 4 is thursday.

OffsetInMinutes.description: Number of minutes past from 00:00 for example 10:00 is 600, which means the restaurant is open since 10:00.

DurationInMinutes.description: Number of minutes the restaurant is open since the offset, for example 120 minutes, which means the restaurant is open during 2h since 10:00.

isOpen.description:
Boolean to set manually if the restaurant is open or not:
- `False`: the restaurant will be set as closed regardless of closing dates and opening times.
- `True`: the restaurant will be set as open regarding closing dates and opening times.

isPublic.description: True if the restaurant wants to be visible for customers, actual visibility value is `isPublished` (refer to that field in `RestaurantReadDto`for details).

isOpen.description:
Boolean to set manually if the restaurant is open or not:
- `False`: the restaurant will be set as closed regardless of closing dates and opening times.
- `True`: the restaurant will be set as open regarding closing dates and opening times.

isPublic.description: True if the restaurant wants to be visible for customers, actual display value is `isPublished` (refer to that field for details).

isPublished.description: This is true if the restaurant has a value for all the required fields of `RestaurantCreateDto` plus at least one opening time and one product which has isActive value set to true. If true, the restaurant is visible for customers

isCurrentlyOpenToOrder.description: True if the restaurant accepts orders.

isCurrentlyOpenInPlace.description: True if the restaurant is open to eat in place.

name.description: Must be lowercase. A tag to categorise a product.

quantity.description: Must be between 1 and 10000 or `null` meaning infinite.

isActive.description:
- `True` if the product is available
- `False` to force a product to be unavailable, bypasses the quantity'

productType.description:
One of:
- `0`: Starter,
- `1`: Main,
- `2`: Dessert,
- `3`: Drink,
- `4`: Menu,
- `5`: Daily,
- `6`: Other

quantity.description: Quantity of product between 1 and 10000 or `null` meaning infinite.

isActive.description:
- `True` if the product is available
- `False` if the product is unavailable, bypasses the quantity'

productType.description:
One of:
- `0`: Starter,
- `1`: Main,
- `2`: Dessert,
- `3`: Drink,
- `4`: Menu,
- `5`: Daily,
- `6`: Other

One of:
- `0`: Starter,
- `1`: Main,
- `2`: Dessert,
- `3`: Drink,
- `4`: Menu,
- `5`: Daily,
- `6`: Other

orderState.description:
One of:
- `0`: Idling,
- `1`: Acknowledged,
- `2`: InPreparation,
- `3`: Ready,
- `4`: Delivered,
- `5`: Other,
- `6`: Cancelled,
- `7`: Rejected

reservedForDateTime.description: Must be in future and within restaurant order opening times

isAcknowledged.description:
- `True` if the restaurant is aware of the order
- `False` if the restaurant is not aware of the order

isAccepted.description:
- `True` if the restaurant has accepted the order
- `False` if the restaurant has not accepted the order

isDeleted.description:
- `True` if the order is processed
- `False` if the order is still processing

OrderState.description:
One of:
- `0`: Idling,
- `1`: Acknowledged,
- `2`: InPreparation,
- `3`: Ready,
- `4`: Delivered,
- `5`: Other,
- `6`: Cancelled,
- `7`: Rejected

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: 'Authorization: Bearer {token}'.
